p: As for the chemical class of esters, methyl salicylate, chrysanthenyl acetate and ( E)-2-hexenyl benzoate were identified. Over time chrysanthenyl acetate decreased in cvs. Lastovka and Oblica while an increase occurred in Leccino and Frantoio cultivars. ( E)-2-hexenyl benzoate increased slightly in cv. Frantoio, and was absent in Lastovka and Oblica cultivars, as well as in the third harvest for cv. Leccino.
